EV isolated method: To isolate exosomes from the peripheral blood, samples were centrifuged at 2,000 × g for 10 min two times to separate the plasma, and exosomes were isolated via ultracentrifugation as described above.
Project_Title: Next Generation Sequencing Facilitates Quantitative Analysis of plasma Exosomal miRNAs of small cell lung cancer (human)
Project_Description:
Total RNA was isolated from plasma exosomes of two small cell lung cancer patients at the pre- and post-chemoresistant stages. MiRNA sequencing was performed to assess differential expression using next-generation sequencing. The data showed that most miRNAs levels were different in plasma exosomal. Importantly, miR-92b-3p were much higher in the post-chemoresistant stage than in the pre-chemoresistant stage
Overall design: MiRNA sequencing was performed to assess differential expression of miRNAs in  plasma exosomes of two small cell lung cancer patients at the pre- and post-chemoresistant stages using next-generation sequencing.

EV isolated method: To isolate exosomes from the peripheral blood, samples were centrifuged at 2,000 × g for 10 min two times to separate the plasma, and exosomes were isolated via ultracentrifugation as described above.
